definition: Dangla or Tanggula mountain range on the Qinhai-Tibet plateau
to exaggerate/empty/in vain/old variant of 螗[tang2]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)

sentences.english: The Changjiang River rises in the Tanggula Mountains of Qinghai Province.
sentences.chinese: 它發源於青海省的唐古拉山脈。
